listitem.para: This flag controls whether www URLs and email addresses are automatically converted into clickable links as well as where the www links open when clicked. The options are: OFF = Do not convert www URLs and email addresses LINKS_SAME_WINDOW = Convert to links that open in current window (DEFAULT) LINKS_NEW_WINDOW = Convert to links that open in a new window

A flag that indicates whether to use CDN (content delivery networks) for loading javascript libraries and their associated CSS. This improves performance for loading MantisBT pages. This can be disabled if it is desired that MantisBT doesn't reach out outside corporate network. Default OFF.
